alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:42PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with very heavy rainfall will impact portions of Charlotte and northern Halifax Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with heavy rainfall over Clover, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding in poor drainage and low-lying areas. Ponding of water on roads and highways. Locations impacted include... Keysville... Charlotte Court House... Phenix... Clover... Drakes Branch... Scottsburg... and Mt Laurel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
